Class FontManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestedworld.nestedworld.helper.typeface.FontManager

  • public class FontManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful class typeface management It make typeface easier to load and it will improve the loading by putting the typeface under the cache
